Title: Onaka no Ookina Ouji-sama
Description:
['A fat little king wants to ride a flying carpet. ', '

', "
This is music video for the song by Kouichi Kawatsu that was featured on NHK's Minna no Uta program. On February 4, 1983 NHK rebroadcasted the song but with a new singer Shiro Kishibe; the animated footage though was identical to the original 1975 release.", '
